about_the_game:
Project NOVA is a hyper-fast, movement-focused shooter that takes inspiration from ULTRAKILL, DOOM, and REAVER. Dive into a chaotic battlefield where speed and precision are paramount, and experience a game where your agility is just as important as your firepower.

Unleash Havoc in Multiplayer
  • Adjustable Spawn Time - Tailor the pace of battle to your preference, ensuring every match feels fresh and intense.
  • Dynamic Weapon Mechanics - Master rocket jumping, shotgun boosting, and devastating ultimates to dominate your foes. Our arsenal is designed for chaos and creativity.
  • Relentless Speed - Never stop moving with our innovative, tech-fueled movement mechanics. Keep your momentum and outmaneuver your enemies at every turn.
  • Diverse Gamemodes - Engage in a variety of game modes such as Capture The Flag, Team Deathmatch, Free For All, Gun Game, and more. Each mode offers unique challenges and opportunities for strategy.
Conquer the Battleground
  • Harness the power of our finely-tuned weapons and movement abilities to stay one step ahead of your opponents. Whether you’re launching yourself into the air with a well-placed rocket jump or using your ultimate ability to turn the tide of battle, every moment in Project NOVA is packed with adrenaline-pumping action.

Hyper-Fast, Hyper-Fun
  • In Project NOVA, speed isn’t just an option—it’s a necessity. Utilize a wide array of movement mechanics to maintain your momentum and keep your enemies guessing. The faster you move, the harder you are to hit, and the more you can dominate the battlefield.

Are you ready to become the ultimate force in this relentless, high-speed shooter? The battlefield awaits.

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts Gun and corporal combat

name: Project NOVA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd 520
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are a speculation
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are a speculation

short_description: Project NOVA is a hyper-fast, chaotic shooter inspired by ULTRAKILL, DOOM, and REAVER. Dive into relentless multiplayer battles with dynamic weapon mechanics, tech-fueled movement, and diverse game modes. Master the chaos, never stop moving, and unleash unparalleled fun on the battlefield!
